content: I think Emily's music is more on the indie-folk side, with a focus on storytelling through her lyrics. She has a very soothing voice, kind of like Lucy Dacus. Thanks for the recommendations, I'll definitely check them out. By the way, I've been meaning to ask, do you know any good resources for learning how to play the guitar? I've been trying to teach myself through YouTube tutorials, but I'm not making much progress.
